name: Golden Teacher
description: Golden Teacher is one of the most popular cubensis varieties, known for its balanced effects and reliable growth.
appearance: Medium-sized with golden-yellow caps, up to 8 cm wide, and slender pale stems.
medicinalBenefits: May help with depression and anxiety

name: B+ Cubensis
description: B+ is a resilient and forgiving strain, perfect for beginners. It produces large mushrooms with caramel-colored caps.
appearance: Large caps with caramel coloration, thick stems, and impressive size.

name: Penis Envy
description: Penis Envy is known for its distinctive appearance and potent effects. It requires more attention during cultivation.
appearance: Thick, dense stems with bulbous caps and distinctive phallic shape.

name: Blue Oyster
description: Blue Oyster is a delicious gourmet mushroom with a mild, savory flavor. Easy to grow on a variety of substrates.
appearance: Fan-shaped caps with blue-gray coloration and white stems growing in clusters.
medicinalBenefits: Good source of protein and nutrients
culinaryUses: Excellent in stir-fries, soups, and pasta dishes

name: Lion's Mane
description: Lion's Mane is prized for its cognitive-enhancing properties and unique appearance. It resembles a white lion's mane as it grows.
appearance: White, shaggy appearance with icicle-like spines hanging downward.
medicinalBenefits: Supports nerve and brain health, may help with dementia and Alzheimer's
culinaryUses: Delicate seafood-like flavor, great as a meat substitute

name: Reishi
description: Reishi is known as the 'mushroom of immortality' in traditional Chinese medicine. It has a woody texture and bitter taste.
appearance: Kidney-shaped caps with reddish-brown lacquered surface and white edges.
moodEffects: May reduce stress and promote calmness
medicinalBenefits: Supports immune system, anti-inflammatory, may help with sleep
culinaryUses: Typically used in teas and extracts rather than cooking

name: Shiitake
description: Shiitake is one of the most popular edible mushrooms worldwide, known for its rich, savory flavor and medicinal properties.
appearance: Brown umbrella-shaped caps with white gills and stems.
medicinalBenefits: Supports immune function, contains lentinan which may have anti-cancer properties
culinaryUses: Rich umami flavor, excellent in Asian cuisine, soups, and stir-fries

name: Mazatapec
description: Mazatapec is a traditional strain from Mexico with a long history of ceremonial use. It's known for its spiritual effects.
appearance: Medium-sized with light brown to caramel caps and long, slender stems.

name: Wavy Caps
description: Wavy Caps are known for their distinctive wavy cap shape and potent effects. They prefer outdoor cultivation in wood chip beds.
appearance: Caramel to chestnut brown caps with distinctive wavy edges when mature.

name: Turkey Tail
description: Turkey Tail is a medicinal mushroom known for its immune-boosting properties. It grows in colorful, overlapping layers resembling turkey tails.
appearance: Thin, leathery, multi-colored concentric zones resembling turkey tails.
medicinalBenefits: Contains PSK and PSP which may boost immune function, studied for cancer support
culinaryUses: Too tough to eat, typically used in teas and extracts
